data: I had ridden all day through an endless vista of ghostly grey gums and ironbarks, when I came in sight of the long wavering line of vivid green foliage which showed me that I had reached my destinationâ€”a roughly-built slab hut with a roof of corrugated iron.

"Five-Head" Creek; and Fish Drugging in the Pacific
1901
